title: Govindas Surfers Paradise
typeOfFood: Vegan, Indian, Buffet, Take-out, Asian, Catering
description: Offers a buffet of Indian dishes like dhal and curry plus rice and salads. For dessert there is vegan cheesecake, mousse cake, sago pudding, halva, raw cake. Formerly Govindas Veg-o-Rama and in 2014 relocated from Shop 134 Centro Shopping Centre Cavill Ave and modified menu to be all-vegan.
streetAddress: Shop 6, 3120 Surfers Paradise Blvd, Surfers Paradise
